channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Twitter suspends memecoin-linked AI bot after Elon Musk's ‘scam crypto’ claim
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: "Explain This Bob," the popular AI-powered Twitter account also linked to a memecoin, was suspended shortly after Elon Musk alleged it was a "scam."

item.title: Watch out Ordinals, 30,000 ‘Ethscriptions’ land on Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Inspired by Bitcoin Ordinals inscriptions, Ethscriptions offer a new way to mint NFTs on Ethereum.

item.title: Web3 Gamer: Apple to fix gaming? SEC hates Metaverse, Logan Paul trolled on Steam
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Callan Quinn
item.description: Apple finally makes a play for gamers, SEC takes aim at Metaverse tokens, CryptoZoo trolled on Steam, memestock lord is GameStop’s new CEO.

item.title: Bitcoin bulls look to re-establish control — Will BNB, LTC, OKB and QNT follow?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin’s price is showing some strength. Here’s what it would take for BNB, LTC, OKB and QNT to follow.

item.title: Is the cryptocurrency market about to break its 10-week losing streak?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Regulatory uncertainty and the lack of transparency on stablecoins caused crypto markets to trade at its lowest levels in three months.

item.title: Binance sends cease and desist notice to fraudulent Nigerian entity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: This comes after the Nigerian Securities and Exchange Commission released a circular stating the illegality of Binance Nigeria Limited in the country.

item.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust nears 2023 highs on BlackRock ETF filing as buyers step up
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Institutional buying interest in GBTC accompanies hopes that BlackRock will secure the first U.S. Bitcoin spot ETF.

item.title: How to write effective ChatGPT prompts for better results
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover the key techniques for writing highly effective ChatGPT prompts that yield superior results.

item.title: Binance CEO CZ deems SEC’s request for emergency relief unwarranted
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Binance CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao is pleased the disagreement with the SEC is over.

item.title: CZ, Powell and more rally to fund legal fees for on-chain sleuth ZachXBT, surpassing $1M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: ZachXBT fears legal fees to defend himself in the defamation lawsuit could “easily exceed” $1 million.

item.title: Ripple case nears conclusion, but the fight for clarity must ‘continue’ — Brad Garlinghouse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: In a video posted to Twitter, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse opined that the U.S. financial watchdog acted in “bad faith, plain and simple.“

item.title: Gary Gensler’s job at risk, BlackRock’s first spot Bitcoin ETF and other news: Hodler’s Digest, June 11-17
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: U.S. representative introduces bill to fire SEC’s chief, BlackRock applies for a spot Bitcoin ETF and Binance.US hires top lawyer for upcoming court battles.

item.title: BUSD falls to fourth position among stablecoins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: After a dip of over $1 billion in the past 30 days, BUSD now sits fourth in market capitalization among stablecoins.

item.title: US court approves SEC-Binance.US agreement
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: As per the approved agreement, only Binance.US employees will have access to client funds until the litigation is resolved.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is the crypto market up today
item.description: The crypto market is up today as traders assess its oversold levels and the prospects of the SEC approving the first Bitcoin ETF.

item.title: 5 AI tools for learning and research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Supercharge your learning and research capabilities with AI tools, enabling you to gain a competitive edge and reach new levels of understanding.

item.title: ​SEC and Binance.​​US strike a temporary agreement on asset access
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Proposed measures include restricting Binance officials’ access to private keys and disclosing business expenses.

item.title: Tether responds to account deactivation controversy, raises compliance checks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Stablecoin issuer Tether has responded to claims that it deactivated the accounts of major crypto firms, including MoonPay.

item.title: The new frontier: Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson goes hunting for aliens and UFOs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Harvard astronomer Avi Loeb is leading the expedition and said the team had found a couple of bizarre objects.

item.title: Crypto payments platform Wyre shutters, citing bear market conditions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Wyre has begun the process of winding down and noted that interested parties can now start inquiring about purchasing the firm’s assets.

item.title: Nike teases upcoming ‘Airphoria’ NFT sneaker hunt on Fortnite
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: In a short promotional video, Nike’s logo for its Web3 platform, “.Swoosh,” features alongside the logos for Epic Games’ Unreal Engine and Fortnite.

item.title: On-chain sleuth ZachXBT sued for libel after claiming plaintiff drained funds from project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Plaintiff Jeffrey Huang claims his reputation was damaged when ZachXBT allegedly falsely accused him of embezzlement.

item.title: Ethereum network upgrade and uptick in Arbitrum active users could trigger an ARB price reversal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Positive Ethereum and Arbitrum network developments and the eventual improvement in crypto investor sentiment could lend a boost to the ARB price.

item.title: ‘We had to change strategies,' says SEC enforcement director on recent actions: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The SEC has taken enforcement actions against several crypto firms, a move that has been criticized by many U.S. lawmakers and industry leaders.

item.title: Curve pool imbalance triggers USDT depeg concerns: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had another bearish week, with the majority of tokens trading in the red.

item.title: Think AI tools aren't harvesting your data? Guess again
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Erik Prince & Ryan Paterson
item.description: When you use a “free” product like ChatGPT, your personal data is the product — and governments across the globe are using that to their advantage.

item.title: 3 key Ether price metrics point to growing resistance at the $1,750 level
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ether's price looks poised for additional downside as low as the $1,560 level.

item.title: Meta’s new ‘Voicebox’ AI is a text-to-speech tool that learns like ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Meta claims Voicebox is the first AI that can generalize text-to-speech tasks it wasn’t trained to accomplish and describes it as a “breakthrough.”

item.title: Crypto Biz: Crypto outflows surge, a16z’s UK office, and the silent altcoins ban
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A tight regulatory environment in the United States, coupled with soaring interest rates, is forcing crypto companies to rethink their business strategies.

item.title: Price analysis 6/16: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin has reclaimed the $26,000 level, but will large cap altcoins follow BTC's rebound?
